title: Is it a must to listen to Quran recitation in the masjid? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: who'sa says in my local masjid for about 30 minutes before the share comes into the Masjid to do to fear someone will be reciting the Quran loudly and people will be listening can I also recite the Quran silently or is it a must for me to listen to his recitation no you can read your own Quran without any problem which Allah
